channel.title: LSE:GSK on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in LSE:GSK on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: GSK Set for $500 Million Payment From mRNA Lawsuit Settlement
item.description: CureVac NV has settled a long-running patent dispute over mRNA vaccines with Pfizer Inc. and BioNTech SE in the US, which will see CureVac’s former collaborator GSK Plc receive as much as $500 million

item.title: GSK Set for $500 Million Payment From mRNA Lawsuit Settlement
item.description: CureVac NV has settled a long-running patent dispute over mRNA vaccines with Pfizer Inc. and BioNTech SE in the US, which will see CureVac’s former collaborator GSK Plc receive as much as $500 million

item.title: Hengrui Shares Jump on GSK Deal Worth Up To $12 Billion
item.description: Jiangsu Hengrui Pharmaceuticals Co. shares rallied to their highest levels in four years after GSK Plc agreed to pay $500 million upfront for the company’s potential chronic lung disease treatment.
